  • Method Details

    • readConquestMap

      public WargameMap readConquestMap(String p_mapName)
      Reads the ".map" file and creates a GameMap object accordingly. Performs basic validation checks too.
      Parameters:
      p_mapName - Name of the map file to be read
      Returns:
      object representing the map just read

    • readContinents

      public BufferedReader readContinents(BufferedReader p_reader, WargameMap p_map)
      Reads the continents from the ".map" files. Exits the program if error of duplicate continents is found.
      Parameters:
      p_reader - Stream starting from continents section of ".map" file
      p_map - Represents the game map
      Returns:
      BufferedReader stream at the point where it has finished reading continents

    • readTerritories

      public BufferedReader readTerritories(BufferedReader p_reader, WargameMap p_map)
      Reads the countries from the ".map" files. Exits the program if duplicate country or in non-existent country.
      Parameters:
      p_reader - Stream starting from countries section of ".map" file
      p_map - Represents the game map
      Returns:
      BufferedReader stream at the point where it has finished reading countries

    • addToContinentMap

      public void addToContinentMap(Country p_newCountry, WargameMap p_map)
      Registers this new country as part of its continent. If duplicate country, exits the program throwing error.
      Parameters:
      p_newCountry - Country to be registered with the corresponding continent
      p_map - Represents the map of the game

    • saveMap

      public boolean saveMap(WargameMap p_map, String p_fileName)
      Saves map in Conquest map file format
      Parameters:
      p_map - GameMap object representing the map to be saved
      p_fileName - Name with which map file is to be saved
      Returns:
      true if successful in saving the map, else false
